'''Shelob's Lair''' is the eleventh track of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - Original Motion Picture Soundtrack]]'' and the thirteenth track of disc two of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King - The Complete Recordings]]'' by [[Howard Shore]].
